about_the_game: Akihabara, the electric town--hub for state-of-the-art technology, fashion, otaku goods, and the cutest boys in skirts you will ever see. Pop into the Girls! Girls! Girls!? Cafe and fall in love with one of four charming "ladies..." or maybe even all of them? Jump into a story full of fluff, romance, friendship, and crossdressing that will keep you coming back for more!

content_descriptors.notes:
- Grown-up jokes, dialogues and references
- Occasional bulges

detailed_description: Akihabara, the electric town--hub for state-of-the-art technology, fashion, otaku goods, and the cutest boys in skirts you will ever see. Pop into the Girls! Girls! Girls!? Cafe and fall in love with one of four charming "ladies..." or maybe even all of them? Jump into a story full of fluff, romance, friendship, and crossdressing that will keep you coming back for more!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.1
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Girls! Girls! Girls!? Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
